name: FRigUnit_SetBoneTransform
doc: SetBoneTransform is used to perform a change in the hierarchy by setting a single bone's transform.

Bone: The name of the Bone to set the transform for.
Transform: The transform value to set for the given Bone.
Space:
Defines if the bone's transform should be set
in local or global space.
Weight: The weight of the change - how much the change should be applied
bPropagateToChildren:
If set to true all of the global transforms of the children
of this bone will be recalculated based on their local transforms.
Note: This is computationally more expensive than turning it off.
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
